blogPost.excerpt: A/B Testing and Feature Management across your React Native apps is here. Give your team the flexibility to run experiments and roll-out new features with the Taplytics React Native SDK.
blogPost.body: A/B Testing and Feature Management across your React Native apps is here. Give your team the flexibility to run experiments and roll-out new features with the Taplytics React Native SDK.
blogPost.title: Taplytics React Native A/B Testing - A/B Testing and Feature Management for your React Native app
blogPost.author: Will Lam

localize.description: 在您的React Native应用中进行A/B测试和功能管理。通过Taplytics React Native SDK，让您的团队可以灵活地进行实验和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 为您的React Native应用进行A/B测试和功能管理。

localize.description: 在您的React Native應用中進行A/B測試和功能管理。通過Taplytics React Native SDK，讓您的團隊可以靈活地進行實驗和推出新功能。
localize.tagline: 爲您的React Native應用進行A/B測試和功能管理。

previous.title: 92% of all bad advice on Twitter begins w/the phrase “pro tip”

localize.full_text: 推特上92%的坏建议都是以 "专业建议 "开头的。
推特上92%的壞建議都是以 "專業建議 "開頭的。

next.excerpt: Community Fund is an initiative by The Product Folks to help communities with mentorship, funding, and important resources required to go from 0-1.
next.title: Community Fund - An early-stage accelerator to help communities grow from 0-1

localize.description: 社区基金是由The Product Folks发起的一项倡议，旨在帮助社区提供从0-1的指导、资金和所需的重要资源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，帮助社区从0-1成长起来

localize.description: 社區基金是由The Product Folks發起的一項倡議，旨在幫助社區提供從0-1的指導、資金和所需的重要資源。
localize.tagline: 早期加速器，幫助社區從0-1成長起來
